===Etymology===
From {{inh|hu|urj-pro|*wete}}.<ref>{{R:Uralonet|1142}}</ref> First attested in the late 12th century.<ref>{{R:Zaicz 2006}}</ref> Cognates include {{cog|mns|вит}}, {{cog|fi|vesi}}, {{cog|et|vesi}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{hu-IPA}}
* {{audio|hu|Hu-víz.ogg|Audio}}
* {{rhymes|hu|iːz|s=1}}

===Noun===
{{hu-noun|~|pl=vizek}}

# [[water]] {{gloss|liquid H<sub>2</sub>O}}<!-- this formatting displays better and it can be more generally used than subscript numbers like "₂", it's also applied in the article https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemical_formula -->
# {{lb|hu|physics}} [[water]] {{gloss|chemical having the formula H<sub>2</sub>O}}
#: {{syn|hu|dihidrogén-monoxid}}
# [[water]] {{gloss|any body of water, or a specific part of it}}
#* '''1844''', [[w:Sándor Petőfi|Sándor Petőfi]], ''János vitéz'',<sup>[http://mek.oszk.hu/01000/01010/01010.htm]</sup> chapter 4, stanza 1, translated by John Ridland:<sup>[http://www.magyarulbabelben.net/works/hu/Pet%C5%91fi_S%C3%A1ndor-1823/J%C3%A1nos_Vit%C3%A9z_%28teljes%29/en/58450-John_the_Valiant_%28complete%29]</sup>
#*: Mikorra a patak '''vize''' tükörré lett, / Melybe ezer csillag ragyogása nézett: / Jancsi Iluskáék kertje alatt vala; / Maga sem tudta, hogy mikép jutott oda.
#*:: When the brook made a looking glass of its '''water''', / In whose surface a thousand stars were a-glitter, / Johnny was standing at the foot of Nell’s yard; / Though to tell how he'd come to it would have been hard.
# {{lb|hu|dialectal}} [[flood]]
#: {{syn|hu|árvíz}}
# [[drinking water]], [[mineral water]]
#: {{syn|hu|ivóvíz}}
# [[bathwater]]
#: {{syn|hu|fürdővíz}}
# [[sweat]]
#: {{syn|hu|izzadság|veríték|verejték}}
#* '''1939''', {{w|Jenő Rejtő}}, ''A Nevada szelleme'',<sup>[http://mek.oszk.hu/01500/01598/01598.htm#2]</sup> chapter 2:
#*: Ez a férfi csakúgy sugározta magából a durva, nyugati ember kegyetlen erejét és vadságát. Bár folyt a '''víz''' róla, és inge izzadtan tapadt a testéhez, vasegészségében bízva egyetlen hajtásra itta ki a jeges whiskyt.
#*:: This man exuded the cruel strength and ferocity of the rough, Western man. Though he was dripping with '''water''', and his shirt clung to his body with sweat, he drank the icy whisky in one gulp, trusting his iron health.
# {{lb|hu|rare}} [[water]] {{gloss|limpidity and lustre of a precious stone}}
